mdRecord.dcterms:title: In Congress, July 4, 1776: A declaration by the representatives of the United States of America, in general congress assembled
Declaration by the representatives of the United States of America
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by John Gill, and Powars and Willis, in Queen-Street
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Second issue printed by Gill and Powars and Willis, with a single rule and imprint at bottom of sheet. Cf. Walsh.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Gift of Albert H. Small, December 27, 2000. Flat folio, housed in a large white poster board folder on top of cabinets.
